Name: World of Feudal
About the game: My lord, your father was poisoned at a recent meal. Now you the new Lord. People expect you to make smart decisions in the current difficult situation. Our castle is about to fall. Do something! In World of Feudal you have to take the role of lord and manage your castle. - Beautiful graphics - Detailed settlement management - Enemy attacks - Random events - Story line[/]
